function.description: Send a message to a card or chat thread
function.name: huly_send_message

card_id.description: Card ID to send the message to

reaction.description: UTF-8 emoji symbol as reaction for example üëç

function.description: Add message attachement. You can attach to message that was sent by you ONLY
function.name: huly_add_message_attachement

message_id.description: Id of message, can be take from `send_message` tool result

attachement_name.description: Attachement name, can be file name or any other name

attachement_data.description: Attachement data, can be a path fo file in local filesystem or a base64 encoded content in form of `data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAADIA...`
